00038 /**
00039  * @brief Constructor.
00040  *
00041  * @param param Map of key/value pairs to set user-defined parameters.
00042  *
00043  * Errors: The conversion utilities call errAbort() if any of the user
00044  * entered values is of the wrong type.
00045 */
00046 mas5Stat::mas5Stat (map<string,string>& param)
00047   : log_2 (log (2.0))
00048 {
00049   // Zero chips with background count.
00050   m_ChipsWithBackground = 0;
00051   // Convert, set user specified parameters.
00052   convertParams (param);
00053 }
00054

00056  *  @brief Destructor.
00057  *
00058 */
00059 mas5Stat::~mas5Stat()
00060 {
00061   Clear();
00062 }

00064 /**
00065  * @brief Convert user defined parameters, set the corresponding
00066  * class parameters.
00067  *
00068  * @param param Map of key/value pairs to set user-defined parameters.
00069  *
00070  * Default values are set by the SetDefaults() call in the
00071  * CExpStatAlgSettings constructor.
00072  *
00073  * Errors: The conversion utilities will call errAbort() if any of the user
00074  * entered value strings cannot be converted into the desired type.
00075 */
00076 void mas5Stat::convertParams (const map<string,string>& param)
00077 {
00078   map<string,string>::const_iterator iter;
00079   const map<string,string>::const_iterator paramEnd = param.end();
00080 
00081   iter = param.find ("Alpha1");
00082   if (iter != paramEnd)
00083     m_Params.Alpha1 = Convert::toFloat (iter->second.c_str());
00084 
00085   iter = param.find ("Alpha2");
00086   if (iter != paramEnd)
00087     m_Params.Alpha2 = Convert::toFloat (iter->second.c_str());
00088 
00089   iter = param.find ("Tau");
00090   if (iter != paramEnd)
00091     m_Params.Tau = Convert::toFloat (iter->second.c_str());
00092 
00093   iter = param.find ("TGT");
00094   if (iter != paramEnd)
00095     m_Params.TGT = Convert::toFloat (iter->second.c_str());
00096 
00097   iter = param.find ("Gamma1H");
00098   if (iter != paramEnd)
00099     m_Params.Gamma1H = Convert::toFloat (iter->second.c_str());
00100 
00101   iter = param.find ("Gamma1L");
00102   if (iter != paramEnd)
00103     m_Params.Gamma1L = Convert::toFloat (iter->second.c_str());
00104 
00105   iter = param.find ("Gamma2H");
00106   if (iter != paramEnd)
00107     m_Params.Gamma2H = Convert::toFloat (iter->second.c_str());
00108 
00109   iter = param.find ("Gamma2L");
00110   if (iter != paramEnd)
00111     m_Params.Gamma2L = Convert::toFloat (iter->second.c_str());
00112 
00113   iter = param.find ("Perturbation");
00114   if (iter != paramEnd)
00115     m_Params.Perturbation = Convert::toFloat (iter->second.c_str());
00116 
00117   iter = param.find ("SFMethod");
00118   if (iter != paramEnd)
00119     m_Params.SFMethod
00120       = (CExpStatAlgSettings::ScalingOptionsEnum) Convert::toInt (iter->second.c_str());
00121 
00122   iter = param.find ("NormMethod");
00123   if (iter != paramEnd)
00124     m_Params.NormMethod
00125       = (CExpStatAlgSettings::NormalizationOptionsEnum) Convert::toInt (iter->second.c_str());
00126 
00127   iter = param.find ("NormFactor");
00128   if (iter != paramEnd)
00129     m_Params.NormFactor = Convert::toFloat (iter->second.c_str());
00130 
00131   iter = param.find ("ScaleFactor");
00132   if (iter != paramEnd)
00133     m_Params.ScaleFactor = Convert::toFloat (iter->second.c_str());
00134 
00135   m_NumberZones = m_Params.NumberVertZones * m_Params.NumberHorZones;
00136 }

00138 /**
00139  * @brief Set layout (cdf or pgf/clf combination) specific parameters.
00140  *
00141  * @param cols Number of feature columns in the array.
00142  * @param rows Number of feature rows in the array.
00143 */
00144 void mas5Stat::setLayoutParams (int cols, int rows, const map<probeid_t, bool>& maskedProbes,
00145                                 const int probeSetCount, ChipLayout &layout)
00146 
00147 {
00148   m_Cols = cols;
00149   m_Rows = rows;
00150   m_MaskedProbes = maskedProbes;
00151   m_MaskedProbesEnd = m_MaskedProbes.end();
00152   m_ProbeSetCount = probeSetCount;
00153   m_ProbesetProbes = layout.getProbesetProbes();
00154 
00155   // Determine the number of cells per zone in the vertical direction.
00156   int CellsRemaining = cols % m_Params.NumberVertZones;
00157   if (CellsRemaining != 0)
00158     m_ZoneX = (cols + m_Params.NumberVertZones - CellsRemaining) / m_Params.NumberVertZones;
00159   else
00160     m_ZoneX = cols / m_Params.NumberVertZones;
00161 
00162   // Determine the number of cells per zone in the horizontal direction.
00163   CellsRemaining = rows % m_Params.NumberHorZones;
00164   if (CellsRemaining != 0)
00165     m_ZoneY = (rows + m_Params.NumberHorZones - CellsRemaining) / m_Params.NumberHorZones;
00166   else
00167     m_ZoneY = rows / m_Params.NumberHorZones;
00168 
00169   // Ensure that there are a match and mismatch cell in the same zone.
00170   m_ZoneY += m_ZoneY % 2; // EXPRESSION_ATOMS_PER_CELL;
00171 
00172   m_ZoneXF = (float) m_ZoneX;
00173   m_ZoneYF = (float) m_ZoneY;
00174 }
00175 
00176 /**
00177  * @brief Compute background intensity, noise for each zone.
00178  *
00179  * @param data Chip data as vector<float>.
00180  * @param chipsWithBackgroundCount Count of chips for which background
00181  *        has been calculated.
00182 */
00183 void mas5Stat::computeBackground (const vector<float>& data, const int chipsWithBackgroundCount)
00184 {
00185   // Force the caller to keep track of the number of chips for which background
00186   // has been calculated.
00187   assert (chipsWithBackgroundCount == ++m_ChipsWithBackground);
00188   assert (data.size() == (unsigned int)(m_Cols * m_Rows));
00189 
00190   // Global information that is saved.
00191   CSAllZonesInfoType* pZonesInfo = new CSAllZonesInfoType;
00192   m_VecZonesInfo.push_back (pZonesInfo);
00193 
00194   // Allocate space for all atoms intensities and ID's.
00195   int* NumberCellsPerZone = new int[m_NumberZones];
00196 
00197   // Clear arrays.
00198   memset (NumberCellsPerZone, 0, sizeof(int)*m_NumberZones);
00199 
00200   // Loop over all units to determine the zone ID's and intensities.
00201   vector<vector<float> > ZoneCells (m_NumberZones);
00202 
00203   // If there is no probeset information, loop over all probes.
00204   if (m_ProbeSetCount == 0)
00205     for (int colIx = 0; colIx < m_Cols; ++colIx)
00206       for (int rowIx = 0; rowIx < m_Rows; ++rowIx)
00207       {
00208         const bool bMasked = isMasked (colIx, rowIx);
00209         if (! bMasked)
00210         {
00211           const int nZone = DetermineZone (colIx, rowIx);
00212           ZoneCells[nZone].resize (ZoneCells [nZone].size() + 1);
00213           ZoneCells[nZone] [NumberCellsPerZone [nZone] ] =
00214             data [colRowToIndex (colIx, rowIx)];
00215 
00216           if (nZone >= 0 && nZone < m_NumberZones)
00217             NumberCellsPerZone [nZone]++;
00218         }
00219       }
00220   // Else loop over the probesets.
00221   else
00222   {
00223     for(uint32_t posIx = 0; posIx < m_ProbesetProbes.size(); posIx++) {
00224       if(m_ProbesetProbes[posIx] == true) {
00225         const int colIx = posIx % m_Cols;
00226         const int rowIx = posIx / m_Cols;
00227         const bool bMasked = isMasked (colIx, rowIx);
00228         if (! bMasked)
00229           {
00230             const int nZone = DetermineZone (colIx, rowIx);
00231             ZoneCells[nZone].resize (ZoneCells [nZone].size() + 1);
00232             ZoneCells[nZone] [NumberCellsPerZone [nZone] ] =
00233               data [colRowToIndex (colIx, rowIx)];
00234             
00235             if (nZone >= 0 && nZone < m_NumberZones)
00236               NumberCellsPerZone [nZone]++;
00237           }
00238       }
00239     }
00240   }
00241 
00242 
00243   // Allocate zones, set smooth factor and set num zones
00244   pZonesInfo->pZones = new CSZoneInfo[m_NumberZones];
00245   pZonesInfo->number_zones = m_NumberZones;
00246   pZonesInfo->smooth_factor = m_Params.SmoothFactorBG;
00247 
00248   // compute background for each zone
00249   const float lowBG = 0.0;
00250   const float highBG = m_Params.NumberBGCells / 100.0f;
00251   for (int iZone = 0; iZone < m_NumberZones; iZone++)
00252   {
00253     // Compute the center coordinates of each zone.
00254     // (x1,y1) is the upper left corner
00255     // (x2,y2) is the lower right corner
00256     float x1 = (float)( ((int) (iZone % m_Params.NumberVertZones)) * m_ZoneX );
00257     float y1 = (float)( ((int) (iZone / m_Params.NumberVertZones)) * m_ZoneY );
00258     float x2 = x1 + m_ZoneX;
00259     float y2 = y1 + m_ZoneY;
00260     pZonesInfo->pZones[iZone].center.x = (x1 + x2) / 2;
00261     pZonesInfo->pZones[iZone].center.y = (y1 + y2) / 2;
00262 
00263     int iCell = 0;
00264     int numCell = NumberCellsPerZone [iZone];
00265     pZonesInfo->pZones [iZone].numCell = numCell;
00266 
00267     vector<float> zoneI (numCell);
00268     vector<int> rank (numCell);
00269 
00270     for (int i = 0; i < numCell; i++)
00271     {
00272       float inten = ZoneCells[iZone][i];
00273       zoneI[iCell] = modifyIntensitySlightly (inten);
00274       iCell++;
00275     }
00276     FloatPair fp = trimMeanAndStd (zoneI, lowBG, highBG);
00277     pZonesInfo->pZones[iZone].background = fp.value1;
00278     pZonesInfo->pZones[iZone].noise = fp.value2;
00279   }
00280   // End of computing background intensity and noise for each zone.
00281   // Carried zones as the required information.
00282 
00283   delete [] NumberCellsPerZone;
00284 }
00285 
00286 /**
00287  * @brief Compute background adjusted intensity.
00288  *
00289  * @param probeIx Probe index from the cel file.
00290  * @param chipIx Microarray index.
00291  * @param intensity Original intensity.
00292  *
00293  * @return float Adjusted intensity.
00294  *
00295  * Following ExpressionAlgorithmImplementation.cpp, we calculate the adjusted
00296  * intensity whether or not the probe is masked.  That code sets UseAtom[iUnit][iAtom]
00297  * to false if the probe is masked.
00298  *
00299  * Errors: assert chipIx is in range.
00300 */
00301 float mas5Stat::computeBGAdjustedIntensity (const int probeIx, const int chipIx, const float intensity)
00302 {
00303   assert (chipIx < m_ChipsWithBackground);
00304   CSAllZonesInfoType* pZonesInfo = m_VecZonesInfo [chipIx];
00305 
00306   // Compute b(x,y), n(x,y)
00307   const float smoothF = m_Params.SmoothFactorBG;
00308 
00309   // Set the background (with smoothing adjustment) for matchcell.
00310   const int cellX = indexToX (probeIx);
00311   const int cellY = indexToY (probeIx);
00312   float WeightedSumBg = 0.0f;
00313   float WeightedSumNoise = 0.0f;
00314   float WeightedSumDenom = 0.0f;
00315   float background = 0.0f;
00316   float noise = 0.0f;
00317 
00318   for (int k = 0; k < m_NumberZones; k++)
00319   {
00320     const float weightAtXY = computeWeightAtXY ((float)cellX, (float)cellY, pZonesInfo->pZones[k].center.x,
00321       pZonesInfo->pZones[k].center.y, smoothF);
00322     WeightedSumBg    += weightAtXY * pZonesInfo->pZones[k].background;
00323     WeightedSumNoise += weightAtXY * pZonesInfo->pZones[k].noise;
00324     WeightedSumDenom += weightAtXY;
00325   }
00326   if (WeightedSumDenom != 0.0f)
00327   {
00328     background = WeightedSumBg / WeightedSumDenom;
00329     noise = WeightedSumNoise / WeightedSumDenom;
00330   }
00331 
00332   float modifiedI = modifyIntensitySlightly (intensity);
00333   return computeAdjustedIntensity (modifiedI, background, noise);
00334 }
00335 
00336 /**
00337  * @brief Clear data.
00338  *
00339  */
00340 void mas5Stat::Clear()
00341 {
00342   // m_Params are set by the constructor, not cleared here.
00343   const int vecZoneCount = (int) m_VecZonesInfo.size();
00344   for (int i = 0; i < vecZoneCount; ++i)
00345   {
00346     CSAllZonesInfoType* pZonesInfo = m_VecZonesInfo[i];
00347     delete [] pZonesInfo->pZones;
00348     delete pZonesInfo;
00349   }
00350   m_VecZonesInfo.clear();
00351   m_MaskedProbes.clear();
00352   m_MaskedProbesEnd = m_MaskedProbes.end();
00353 
00354   m_Cols = m_Rows = m_ZoneX = m_ZoneY = m_ChipsWithBackground
00355    = m_NumberZones = 0;
00356   m_ZoneXF = m_ZoneYF = 0.0;
00357 }
00358 
00359 /**
00360  * @brief Compute detection p-values.
00361  *
00362  * @param pmI Vector of perfect match intensities.
00363  * @param mmI Vector of mismatch intensities.
00364  * @param pmIndex Vector of perfect match probe ids.
00365  * @param mmIndex Vector of mismatch probe ids.
00366  * @param pValue P-value for detection.
00367  * @param call Expression call (output).
00368  * @param pairs Probe pairs (output).
00369  * @param pairsUsed Probe pairs used (output).
00370  */
00371 void mas5Stat::computeExpressionStat (const vector<float>& pmI, const vector<float>& mmI,
00372                                       const vector<probeid_t>& pmId,const vector<probeid_t>& mmId,
00373                                       double& pValue, unsigned char& call,
00374                                       int& pairs, int& pairsUsed)
00375 {
00376   const size_t pmSize = pmI.size();
00377   assert (pmSize != 0);
00378   assert (pmSize == mmI.size());
00379   assert (pmSize == pmId.size());
00380   assert (pmSize == mmId.size());
00381 
00382   vector<double> discMinusTau (pmSize);
00383   const double tau1 = m_Params.Tau;
00384 
00385   // Loop over the cells in the unit
00386   int ctr = 0;
00387   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pmSize; ++i)
00388   {
00389     const int pmX = pmId[i] % m_Cols;
00390     const int pmY = pmId[i] / m_Cols;
00391     const int mmX = mmId[i] % m_Cols;
00392     const int mmY = mmId[i] / m_Cols;
00393 
00394     if (isMasked (pmX, pmY) == false && isMasked (mmX, mmY) == false)
00395       // Exclude saturated probe pair.
00396       if (mmI[i] < m_Params.SaturatedIntensity)
00397       {
00398         const double sum = pmI[i] + mmI[i];
00399         if (sum > 0.0f)
00400           discMinusTau[ctr] = ((pmI[i] - mmI[i]) / sum) - tau1;
00401         else
00402           discMinusTau[ctr] =  -tau1;
00403         ctr ++;
00404       }
00405   }
00406 
00407   // Compute the absolute call.
00408   pairs = pmSize;
00409   if (ctr <= 0)
00410   {
00411     call = EXP_NO_ABS_CALL_TYPE;
00412     pValue = 0.0f;
00413     pairsUsed = 0;
00414     return;
00415   }
00416 
00417   discMinusTau.resize (ctr);
00418   ExpResults result = newSignRank (discMinusTau, m_Params.Alpha1, m_Params.Alpha2);
00419 
00420   CSAbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType unit;
00421   ComputeAbsoluteCall (&unit, &result);
00422   call = unit.Detection;
00423 
00424   pairs = pmSize;
00425   pValue = result.p_value;
00426   pairsUsed = ctr;
00427 }
00428 
00429 /**
00430  * @brief Compute average measurement.
00431  *
00432  * @param pmI Vector of perfect match intensities.
00433  * @param mmI Vector of mismatch intensities.
00434  * @param pmIndex Vector of perfect match probe ids.
00435  * @param mmIndex Vector of mismatch probe ids.
00436  * @param avgMeasurement Average measurement (output).
00437  */
00438 void mas5Stat::computeMeasurement (const vector<float>& pmI, const vector<float>& mmI,
00439                                    const vector<probeid_t>& pmId, const vector<probeid_t>& mmId,
00440                                    double& avgMeasurement)
00441 {
00442   const size_t pmSize = pmI.size();
00443   assert (pmSize != 0);
00444   assert (pmSize == mmI.size());
00445   assert (pmSize == pmId.size());
00446   assert (pmSize == mmId.size());
00447 
00448   // Compute Contrast Value.
00449   vector<float> CT (pmSize);
00450   ComputeContrastValue (pmI, mmI, CT);
00451 
00452   // Compute Probe Value.
00453   vector<float> PV (pmSize);
00454   ComputeProbeValue (pmI, CT, PV);
00455 
00456   // Compute Average Log Intensity for probe set and its confidence interval.
00457   const float c = m_Params.TuningConstantCAvgLogInten;
00458   const float epsilon = m_Params.EpsilonAvgLogInten;
00459 
00460   vector<float> PVused (pmSize);
00461   GetUsedSet (PV, PVused, pmId, mmId);
00462 
00463   avgMeasurement = OneStepBiweightAlgorithm (PVused, c, epsilon);
00464   // Multiply by user-configurable scale factor (default 1.0).
00465   avgMeasurement = antiLog (avgMeasurement) * m_Params.ScaleFactor;
00466 }
00467 
00468 /**
00469  * @brief Compute contrast value.
00470  *
00471  * @param pmI Perfect match intensities.
00472  * @param mmI Mismatch intensities.
00473  * @param CT Contrast value (output).
00474  */
00475 void mas5Stat::ComputeContrastValue (const vector<float>& pmI, const vector<float>& mmI,
00476   vector<float>& CT)
00477 {
00478   float SB;
00479   ComputeTypicalDifference (pmI, mmI, SB);
00480 
00481   const float ContrastTau = m_Params.ContrastTau;
00482   const int nProbePair = (int) pmI.size();
00483   for (int j = 0; j < nProbePair; j++)
00484   {
00485     if (mmI[j] < pmI[j])
00486       CT[j] = mmI[j];
00487     else if ((mmI[j] >= pmI[j]) &&
00488          (SB > ContrastTau))
00489       CT[j] = pmI[j] / (float)antiLog (SB);
00490     else if ((mmI[j] >= pmI[j]) &&
00491          (SB <= ContrastTau))
00492       CT[j] = pmI[j] / (float)antiLog (ContrastTau / (1.0 + (ContrastTau - SB) / m_Params.ScaleTau) );
00493   }
00494 }
00495 
00496 /**
00497  * @brief Compute typical difference.
00498  *
00499  * @param pmI Perfect match intensities.
00500  * @param mmI Mismatch intensities.
00501  * @param SB Step biweight (output).
00502  */
00503 void mas5Stat::ComputeTypicalDifference (const vector<float>& pmI, const vector<float>& mmI, float& SB)
00504 {
00505   const float c = m_Params.TuningConstantCSB;
00506   const float epsilon = m_Params.EpsilonSB;
00507 
00508   const int nProbePair = (int) pmI.size(); // Number of Probe Pairs in Probe Set
00509   vector<float> logPM_minus_logMM (nProbePair);
00510   for (int j = 0; j < nProbePair; j++)
00511     logPM_minus_logMM[j] = logtwo (pmI[j]) - logtwo (mmI[j]);
00512 
00513   SB = OneStepBiweightAlgorithm (logPM_minus_logMM, c, epsilon);
00514 }
00515 
00516 /**
00517  * @brief Compute one-step biweight estimate.
00518  *
00519  * @param x Vector of log differences.
00520  * @param c Tuning constant.
00521  * @param epsilon Epsilon.
00522  * @return Estimate.
00523  */
00524 float mas5Stat::OneStepBiweightAlgorithm (const vector<float> & x, const float& c, const float& epsilon)
00525 {
00526   const int n = (int) x.size();
00527   if (n == 0)
00528     return 0.0f;
00529 
00530   const float medianValue = median (x);
00531   const float MAD = medianAbsoluteDeviation (x) * c + epsilon;
00532   float value = 0.0f;
00533   float weightedSumNumer = 0.0f;
00534   float weightedSumDenom = 0.0f;
00535 
00536   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
00537   {
00538     const float diff = x[i] - medianValue;
00539     const float u = diff / MAD;
00540     const float uSquare = u * u;
00541     const float oneMinusUSqaure = 1.0f - uSquare;
00542     if (fabs (u) < 1.0f)
00543     {
00544       weightedSumNumer += diff * oneMinusUSqaure * oneMinusUSqaure;
00545       weightedSumDenom += oneMinusUSqaure * oneMinusUSqaure;
00546     }
00547   }
00548 
00549   if (weightedSumDenom != 0.0f)
00550     value = medianValue + weightedSumNumer / weightedSumDenom;
00551 
00552   return value;
00553 }
00554 
00555 /**
00556  * @brief Compute probe value.
00557  *
00558  * @param pmI Perfect match intensities.
00559  * @param CT Contrast value.
00560  * @param PV Probe value (output).
00561  */
00562 void mas5Stat::ComputeProbeValue (const vector<float>& pmI, const vector<float>& CT, vector<float>& PV)
00563 {
00564   const float delta = m_Params.Delta;
00565   const float correction = 1.0f + m_Params.BiasCorrect;
00566   const int nProbePair = (int) pmI.size();
00567   for (int j = 0; j < nProbePair; j++)
00568   {
00569     const float v = pmI[j] - CT[j];
00570     if (v < delta)
00571       PV[j] = correction * (float)logtwo (delta);
00572     else
00573       PV[j] = correction * (float)logtwo (v);
00574   }
00575 }
00576 
00577 /**
00578  * @brief Compute used set
00579  *
00580  * @param InputSet Input set.
00581  * @param pmId Perfect match probe ids.
00582  * @param mmId Mismatch probe ids.
00583  * @return vector<float> UsedSet Used set (output).
00584  */
00585 void mas5Stat::GetUsedSet (const vector<float>& InputSet, vector<float>& UsedSet,
00586                            const vector<probeid_t>& pmId, const vector<probeid_t>& mmId)
00587 {
00588   const int size = (int) InputSet.size();
00589   int used = 0;
00590   for (int j = 0; j < size; j++)
00591   {
00592     const int pmX = pmId[j] % m_Cols;
00593     const int pmY = pmId[j] / m_Cols;
00594     const int mmX = mmId[j] % m_Cols;
00595     const int mmY = mmId[j] / m_Cols;
00596 
00597     if (isMasked (pmX, pmY) == false && isMasked (mmX, mmY) == false)
00598     {
00599       UsedSet[used] = InputSet[j];
00600       used++;
00601     }
00602   }
00603   UsedSet.resize (used);
00604 }
